answers.answer: Aw..that is so cute. My due date is 3/7/11 but this one will prolly be around 2-3wks early too cuz I have big babies (diabetes). I looked and looked for names and the only reason I have a name for a girl is because I had a dream in April I had a baby girl and named her. Imagine my surprise when I found out I was pregnant in June and tomorrow I will be 7wks!Btw...I think Celtic weddings and names are beautiful!
thanks!  i'm worried about gestational diabetes and hoping i can stay clear of that, but i have a feeling that's not going to happen.  and ya i had a dream about my names too. crazy good luck to you!

question: so i posted not long ago that my due date was 3/16. well i went to the doc's and found out that's not the case anymore.I'm actually due on....St. Patrick's Day!!!!!!! i'm so freaking excited and i hope that due date stays true. i'm very irish and i even have Celtic names picked out longgg before knowing this too.  i'm even having a Celtic wedding in 2012....the year of the leap year (also known as my birthday) haha! so ya i'm really a 5 year old pregnant...lol
title: goofed on due date already
